Package org.goplanit.utils.graph.directed

Interface DirectedVertex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<IdAble>, ExternalIdAble, GraphEntity, IdAble, ManagedId, Serializable, Vertex
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CentroidVertex, ConjugateConnectoidNode, ConjugateDirectedVertex, ConjugateNode, Node, ServiceNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CentroidVertexImpl, ConjugateConnectoidNodeImpl, ConjugateDirectedVertexImpl, ConjugateNodeImpl, DirectedVertexImpl, NodeImpl, ServiceNodeImpl
    public interface DirectedVertex
extends Vertex
    Directed vertex representation connected to one or more edge segments that have direction. The vertex itself is of course not directional
    Author:
    markr
